name: a comfortable lobby
desc: A carpeted room with potted plants and leather lounge chairs. A fireplace is crackeling in the corner.

contents.name: {#yellow}wooden sign{#reset}
contents.desc:
The sign reads: 
{#yellow}Welcome to mud.tilde.town!
We're still setting up the place, but feel free to have a look around.
